rows.label: qst102702_msg0001
rows.name: Welcome to the Smaia Clinic.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, I see... Yes, I can see how other
doctors might not be equipped to
take on such an unusual case.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0003
rows.name:
Unfortunately, Doctor Smaia
isn't in the clinic right now.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0004
rows.name:
She's on a trip to Temperantia, as part
of her research on a new remedy.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0005
rows.name:
I believe she's currently working at
the Superbian military station there.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0006
rows.name:
If you're in a hurry, it might be
quickest to travel there and
find her yourself.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0007
rows.name:
No no, that's quite all right.
Frankly, I'm sorry I couldn't do more
to help after you came all this way.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0008
rows.name:
Just...try not to be too shocked
when you do meet the Doctor.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0009
rows.name:
It's just that she's a little...eccentric.
People tend to be somewhat
taken aback.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0101
rows.name:
Doctor Smaia is conducting research
at the Superbia military installation
in Temperantia.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0102
rows.name: I wish you the best of luck finding her.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0201
rows.name:
Doctor Smaia is back from her
research trip. I guess things are going
to get lively around here again.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0301
rows.name:
Which ingredient would you like
to hear about?

rows.label: qst102702_msg0302
rows.name: (Which should I ask about?)

rows.label: qst102702_msg0303
rows.name: Gloomwood Root

rows.label: qst102702_msg0304
rows.name: Cloud Sea Halite

rows.label: qst102702_msg0305
rows.name: A vegetable that makes you feel young

rows.label: qst102702_msg0321
rows.name:
Gloomwood Root can be found in
Spirit Crucible Elpys, or so I've heard.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0322
rows.name:
As the name suggests, it's a root,
so you'll probably find it in an area
with plant life.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0341
rows.name:
Cloud Sea Halite is a natural salt
found on the Cliffs of Mors.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0342
rows.name:
You'll probably have the most luck
in rocky areas like caves.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0361
rows.name:
Ah yes, that's a difficult one...
Doctor Smaia does demand the most
oddly specific things sometimes.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0362
rows.name:
Actually, I think I heard something
about a farmer in Gula trying to
cultivate a brand-new vegetable...

rows.label: qst102702_msg0363
rows.name:
Maybe you should go and see
if that would suit our purposes.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0401
rows.name:
Would you like to hear about
Dragon Incense?

rows.label: qst102702_msg0402
rows.name: What should we do?

rows.label: qst102702_msg0403
rows.name: Hear the explanation.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0404
rows.name: Not interested.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0420
rows.name:
Dragon Incense is a crystallized
substance formed from the digestive
secretions of the Invidian Divine Beast.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0421
rows.name:
It's hard to procure in large quantities,
but has an exquisite aroma and medical
properties, so it sells for a high price.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0422
rows.name:
True Dragon Incense is the name given
to samples of exceptionally high purity.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0423
rows.name:
It's said that once upon a time, you
could build a whole house for the price
of a single True Dragon Incense crystal.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0424
rows.name:
The secretion is unique to the Invidian
Divine Beast; no other Divine Beasts produce it.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0425
rows.name:
I think that just about covers it.
Well, good luck out there!

rows.label: qst102702_msg0450
rows.name: Oh, all right. Take care, then.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0501
rows.name:
Ah, you must have found the
True Dragon Incense.
I can tell from the scent.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0502
rows.name: Mmmmmm...the fragrance is exquisite!

rows.label: qst102702_msg0601
rows.name:
I always thought Flesh Eaters were
nothing more than a legend, you know.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0602
rows.name:
It's quite a revelation to learn that
they actually exist! I'd like to meet
one someday.
